projectDesc.p: ParlaMint is a project that aims to (1) create a multilingual set of comparable corpora of parliamentary proceedings uniformly encoded according to the ParlaMint encoding guidelines; (2) add linguistic annotations to the corpora and machine-translate them to English; (3) make the corpora available for download and through analysis tools; and (4) build use cases in Political Sciences and Digital Humanities based on the corpus data.

Spaces were normalized. sequences of dots replaced with a single dot. Adjected notes were joined. Opening and closing parentheses were moved into notes if missing. Regular apostrophes was replaced with soft apostrophes (used in Ukrainian).
